name: Caius Assault Rifle MKII
description:
An upgraded assault rifle.
Originally found in an abandonned UN blacksite.

name: K9 Smart Gun
description: Manufactured by 07 industries, this smart gun can fire bullets that follow user-inputed trajectories.

name: Pavlichenko Sniper Rifle
description: A standard-issue neorus energy sniper rifle. A notice on the side says: Небольшой риск возгорания при охлаждении магазина при перезарядке

name: Ushkuyniks Breaching Shotgun
description: A short-range energy weapon for those close quarter fights. Capable of obliterating obstacles and enemies alike

name: Icarus Plasma Grenades
description:
Grenade in use by UN expeditionary forces. Expend a charge for the following effect:
  • Plasma Grenade (Grenade, Range 3, Blast 2): Affected characters must succeed on an Agility save or take 3 Energy damage.

actions.name: Use Plasma Grenade
actions.detail: Throw a grenade within Range 3. Affected characters must succeed on an Agility save or take 3 Energy damage.

name: Babel 16 Grenade
description:
Grenade employing Babel-16 instances to cause visual and audio memetic damage. Expend a charge for the following effect:
  • 16 Grenade (Grenade, Range 3, Blast 4): ALL affected characters must succeed on an System save or take 3 memetic damage and be IMPAIRED for a turn.

actions.name: Use 16 Grenade
actions.detail: Throw a grenade within Range 3. Affected characters must succeed on an Agility save or take 3 Memetic damage and be IMPAIRED for a turn (written as Energy here).

name: T05 Bullet Grenades
description:
Smart grenade manufactured by the 07 Industries in the Robotic League. Expend a charge for the following effect:
  • Plasma Grenade (Grenade, Range 3, Blast 4): Choose 1 character within Blast radius, they must succeed on an Agility save or take 4 Kinetic damage. Has no effet on mechs.

actions.name: Use T05 Grenade
actions.detail: Throw a grenade within Range 4. Chooe 1 character in Blast 3, they must succeed on an Agility save or take 4 Kinetic damage. Has no effet on mechs.

name: Krepost Ballistic Shield
description:
During their turn, the bearer of this shield can select 2 adjacent hex edges (or 1 square edge) belonging to their current tile.
All incoming pilot attacks whose trajectory intersects these edges receive 1 Difficulty. This is ignored by weapons with the Arcing tag.

name: Slime-in-a-jar
description:
Solid jar containing 1 rock slime. The slime can be deployed for the following effect:
  • Rock Slime: repairs broken equipment, technicals and mechs. If used on a technical or mech, the slime can bring it back to working order and heal it for 2 HP; the affected piece of equipment then receives the Slime tag.
    Has no effect on equipment with the Slime tag.

deployables.name: Rock Slime
deployables.detail:
Repairs broken equipment, technicals and mechs. If used on a technical or mech, the slime can bring it back to working order and heal it for 2 HP; the affected piece of equipment then receives the Slime tag.
Has no effect on equipment with the Slime tag.

name: LCS Communication System
description:
Laser Communication system that works even under CAAD. Allows for communication with any other user, ship or mech connected to the same network. May not work in building interiors.
Should connection be completetly lost, a DC7 Systems or Engineering check is required to reconnect.

name: Portable Slime Backpack
description: A backpack containing two slimes which have been taught to transform at the cost of a full action into various shapes such as that of glider.

name: Self-Propelled Trolley
description: Self-proppeled trolley can be used to carry more items... or to ride it. It costs 1 full action to get out of the trolley and then use any gear item. You guys should stop looting this much. Does not stack. CURRENTLY NOT IN STOCK.

name: Medusa Mask
description: A medusa mask which prevents onlookers from directly looking at the wearer's face. Does not make the wearer invisible, although there is a tendency not to look at them unless they stand out.

name: Golden Slime
description: A Golden slime in a self-propelled trolley containement device. Use a full action to apply it to any surface and the slime will generate a hole on the following turn. Cannot be used with another self-propelled trolley.

name: NOVYY KALASHNIKOV
description: A new take on an old classic, the novyy is a efficient rifle manufactured by the New Soviet Union.

name: KIZLYAR
description: New Soviet Union plasma cutter knife, can be used to roast bratwurst or enemy faces.

name: MILYY STALIN
description: Easily concealed handgun manufactured by the New Soviet Union, named after the famous anime girl which lead the union in the great patriotic war (according to all surviving records).

name: JUTSU
description: An armour guild sidearm akin to the dominator of the ancient legend, Psycho Pass.

name: ORA BOLT RIFLE
description: Huge gun of wapanese design by an unknown manufacturer related to the armour guild.
